website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for North Face fans who want an extremely warm yet lightweight jacket that's designed to look fashionable even on the coldest days.
pros: Crafted to provide serious warmth on cold, wintry days
Earns praise for not being too bulky
cons: Runs somewhat small on some women, especially in the midsection
On the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: FAKE NORTHFACE! I’m so disappointed in the quality of this coat. It simply can’t be genuine Northface. The feathers are literally coming out of all the seams, front, arms & back. I tried to slowly stock up on winter wear over the summer as I only recently moved north from south Florida & now it’s too late to return. I’m absolutely beside myself & sick about my wasted money & no winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I've tried to write a review, Amazon keeps rejecting my 1 star comments. This is not a genuine TNF product. Feathers were falling out and it's only got about 25% of the fill as a genuine TNF coat. I know because I just bought this coat elsewhere and it's completely different. Contacted Amazon, the said to send it back for a refund. DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT A GENUINE TNF PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: BunnyinPA

customer_reviews.title: Feathers from the jacket are out on Day 1
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect but the quality is not as expected. Just as others have mentioned the feathers keep coming out on Day 1 so its not real TNF. See pictures of the new item they call it but it has all feathers coming out..
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGarbo

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic north face
customer_reviews.text: The first day I wore this coat I noticed my left arm was cold near my forearm when I walked outside, when I felt the area there was no filling in the entire square... also the feathers started popping through the seems of the coat along with a white residue... I’ve owned North face coats previously and they have always been extremely warm but this one wasn’t in the wind blew right through it. I would not wasted the money on this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item was a Christmas gift. After one day ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was a Christmas gift. After one day of being worn, the cut tore in a area that the material was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Feathers coming out all the time. I tried to wear it but feathers getting all over my other clothes. Zappos and Amazon both saying return window closed so I am out of luck and a lot of money. Nearly $300 for a jacket and it can't even hold feathers in. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Feathers falling out first week I have it ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it when I first got it but after I wore it all weekend the feathers were coming out all over the place. I have several other North Face jackets and none of them do that.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie L.

customer_reviews.title: Pin feathers everywhere, and mine was used!
customer_reviews.text: This "new" North Face Metropolis Parka II was supposed to be a gift for my wife. The coat has hundreds of down pin feathers coming through the fabric and seams all over it. I spent fifteen minutes trying to pluck them through to make it presentable. Every time you move the coat there are more and more. Then I noticed dried droplets of something across the shoulders. The last straw was when I reached into the left pocket and found a water bottle receipt from the Smithsonian Air & Space Museum. Buyer be warned, and steer clear of The Gear Coop.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold weather months!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this coat. Bought to wear in Sweden during the cold months. My daughter borrowed it and I’m still waiting for it to be returned. Very warm and comfy. So, I’m ordering myself another one ( to keep). It’s sized to fit. If you heavy in the chest department go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Puffer
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the perfect mid-length puffer coat for a good while and this one suits all my needs - hood, neck coverage, pockets and not overly bulky. I have had other North Face products and all have been good quality and value. I shopped the entire internet once I made this choice and this seller has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm during record -50 degree temperature in Chicago 2019!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is the best Winter jacket I've ever owned. I am amazed at how it kept me warm in -50 degree temperature and I am not sweltering hot when I wore it today in 40 degree termperature. I love the hood which keeps me warm when Chicago winds pick up. I love the deep pockets which zip up. I can keep my key badge for building entry in it and not worry about loosing it. I love the long length which helped keep my legs warm during brutal -50 degree Chicago Winter temperature. I LOVE this coat. Its the best coat I've ever owned. And I'm 61 years old.
customer_reviews.author: LHP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coat, but not very warm.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this coat. It was beautiful! It just wasn’t very warm. I wore it outside a couple times and to work once. The two times I wore it outside I was still very cold. I definitely needed another layer under it. I also “liked” the length but didn’t love it like I thought I would. Just above the knee is plenty long for my taste. I determined that a coat with upper inside fleece or wool lining is a better choice for me. So, 3 stars for the look and color (the red was beautiful) but not 5 due to lack of warmth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm down to zero Fahrenheit, light, comfy and sleek for a puffer
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this jacket. It feels as cozy as a down sleeping bag but is sleek and good looking in urban and rural locales. The two-way zipper at the bottom, when I wear it hiking (yes, it's VERY sturdy and warm) in heavy snow helps when I need leg extension uphill. The hood for rain and snow is perfect; snug and not bulky. I have never felt anything but completely comfortable and fashionable in this jacket. The tapered style shows my waist. For a puffer, it doesn't feel puffy. It's LONG. I'm 5'9" and it hits just over my knee. I like that for warmth and the look, but shorter ladies may want to take the length into account.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: I really like this color blue, but the material tends to pick up lint and the feathers began coming out just from trying it out. Quality is not as good as Patagonia's comparable parkas.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: I used the North Face website to determine whether I ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the North Face website to determine whether I should purchase the small or extra small. It suggested the small, which is just a little roomier on my frame than I would prefer. I'm 5'3", 112lbs, 25inch waist, 35.5inch hips. It fits well enough that I didn't think it was worth the hassle to return it. It is very lightweight and kept me warm in 14 degree temps with snow. As others have mentioned, it does "shed" feathers.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper923597

customer_reviews.title: Alas, not like the original
customer_reviews.text: I had the Metropolis Parka original for over ten years, and it was outstanding. This version not so much. The zipper is defective after one month with no flap and snaps to cover the zipper. There seems to be less down as it's not so warm. It's shorter in length/sleeves and snugger through the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but not warm
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a very warm down product. The insulation was described as "down clusters". Turns out this did NOT mean clusters of 100% down, but a mix of down and synthetic fibers. GREAT difference in warmth, which I noticed as soon as I put it on. Still chilled a while later, I searched out the contents label. It could barely be read with a magnifying glass. I loved the fit the cut and the color! And was sad to have to return the coat. Add "warmth degrees" to coats?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same coat...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I had previously had what I thought was the exact same coat in a different color, and returned only because I changed my mind on color. When I ordered this one, it was MUCH THINNER, and seemed poorly made when compared to the first one. Less puffy, and some of the feathers were poking through the seams?? I'm not sure if it was a fluke vs variability on how they are made, but didn't seem to live up the quality of a North Face coat.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jacket - Warm and Well Fitting
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! The sizing is perfect and I would recommend this coat time and time again. I have been searching for the perfect jacket for a long time and this fits the bill. I can wear sweaters and and layer underneath this and still have plenty of room to zip up the jacket and move around. It's also not tight around the hips or shoulders but still gives me a nice silhouette when zipped up. The double zipper comes in very handy when driving to unzip the bottom. I know some reviews said this jacket wasn't warm enough but I found it to be very warm!
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Deep Purple  - Lovely and Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm, just the right length! Bought it for my daughter who leaves to colder climates for university. She LOVES it! The purple is deep and rich, and I love the pockets! The hood is lovely, and works well with hat on head. It zips to almost a turtle neck, which adds extra warmth if you don't like wearing scarves. And for the price...can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: PhiladelphiaMom

customer_reviews.title: Not a brand new jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was shipped with a broken package, also it is very wired that the jacket does not include any trademark. It looks really like not a new jacked but a second-handed one. Have to return it. Found a dirty spot on the jacket. Pretty sure it is not a new one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Comfy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps you warm. Love it! But don’t wash it, not even in hand wash or the feathers will come off. Just wipe it with a damp cloth. Love how it keeps me warm and cozy and comfortable. I just wish instructions would’ve said: “do not wash,” cause is such a beautiful coat to ruin it handwashing it.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Melina Roman

customer_reviews.title: Is this a fake North Face?
customer_reviews.text: My jacket was ordered in October, 2018. I was so excited to get this jacket. I have wanted one for years!! The coat seemed a little thin when I opened it but the size was true to fit and so I wore it anyway. Within 3 weeks I noticed feathers all over the back of the jacket. The feathers are coming out everywhere now. I am now brushing it off daily so knowone thinks I have dandruff. It is quite embarrassing and very disappointing. I plan on calling Amazon on Monday for a refund......wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: John N McKenney

customer_reviews.title: not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment! So not like your usual North Face product. The material was flimsy feeling. Coat was so much longer than the original Metropolis Parka, and I am not short!. The coat just did not feel like it was fully "stuffed" for the warmth that the original Metropolis Parkas are known for.
customer_reviews.author: i lin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coat so far.. bought for my wife for Christmas and was skeptical when it arrived in a tiny box.. however, she opened it and it sprung to life. She loves it, it’s like wearing a down comforter.. and even though some other reviewers said they have had feathers falling out everywhere.. we have not experienced that whatsoever...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I watched this jacket for whole winter and did not see sale. I had to return the jacket because the XS was bit small on me. I ended up buying the size S from a local retailer. Really love this jacket, very elegant, fit very well, do not make me look fat. This year is a warm year. I did not have a chance wear it daily. But whenever I can, I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Liu

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Warm
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of the Metropolis. This newer one is not nearly as warm. It feels more like a Fall coat. My old version kept me warm in sun zero temperatures, but I can’t imagine this one doing the same. We don’t even have snow yet here in MI, and I’m already cold while wearing it. :(
customer_reviews.author: J. Westrate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Michigan Winter Coat!
customer_reviews.text: I went a size larger to allow room for a sweatshirt. I am 5'8 and 170 lbs and usually have the length of coats be short in the arms. It is comfy and perfect for the cold winters! :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coat
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, clean-cut, non-bulky coat. I've received many complements on my purchase. I found the size the company recommended to be a bit snug when I had winter clothing on, so I returned it for the next size up and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this coat. I gave it to her for Christmas and she wears it constantly. It looks so good on her that her mother bought herself one and she loves it too
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: My Wife looks HOT in this
customer_reviews.text: I got the XS for my wife, she's pretty tall and thin at 5'8" and about 120. Fits her form well. she says it keeps her warm, and she wears it everywhere. Authentic product, well made, not a B stock. Came well packaged and protected.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket, however little tiny feather keep popping out through the jacket, so the seat of my car has tons of them on the seat. You would think spending hundreds of dollars on something, that would not occur. But other than that, I do love the fit and feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: Filola

customer_reviews.title: Feathers come out like crazy
customer_reviews.text: This jacket would have been the best purchase ever, if it wasn’t the worst quality in the world. The feathers are coming out like crazy and I’m embarrassed to wear it because it looks like it’s a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: DMITRIY PILIPCHUK

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable coat - fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Coat is very comfortable and warm. When I did the size fitting it said I needed a medium. I had to return it because it was too big. I am normally a small and the small fits perfectly. I have a bubble butt and it fits over it, and I am able to sit down just fine.
customer_reviews.author: suziq

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm and Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had ordered this coat sooner. It keeps me toasty warm at my son's Spring/Fall sporting events. The fit was perfect and the coat is not so bulky or puffy but still very warm. The price was less than any department store so it was definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A good name (North Face) is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied! Critical to get a Winter coat for business traveling... Did not wanna spend $$$ for such a limited use (living in FL)... I didn't spend as much as I easily could have, but I felt like I did, the quality is priceless, but in this case priced very well!
customer_reviews.author: JD real deal regarding purchases... only the truth matters!!

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is super warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is super warm and comfortable. I’m a little alarmed/disappointed at the quantity of feathers that are pushing through already after only wearing it a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie M.

customer_reviews.title: Warm, warm, warm!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical when I took it out of the bag and noticed it was thinner than I thought it'd be. However I wore it that same day in 10 degree weather and was absolutely thrilled with how warm it kept me. A few down feathers have peeked out but nothing I cant handle. I love this coat and the color too. Definitely a keeper for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog for a few miles every single day regardless of the winter weather -- even in sub-zero temps. This coat keeps me warm and shields the wind. I own three of these coats. I spent more money than I wanted to but I expect to have them for the rest of my life. Exceeds quality expectations. Very stylish. I get numerous compliments. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: great lakes mom

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: The coat fit as expected. Bought it for my daughter for cold winters at college. Length came just above the knees. She’s 5’8. 140 lbs. plenty of room for bulky sweaters. She likes the fact that the hood is detachable.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya K.

customer_reviews.title: For really cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey but worth it! For really cold days not cool or mild. Waist area slims so looks even better on. Only reason not 5 stars is there’s only 1 pocket inside! A jacket this size for the price and it being North Face an outdoors co. should me several inside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny T

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and sliming.
customer_reviews.text: Great look and fit. I am 5’ 180 and XL was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Suetj3

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after a year of normal use. I would have expected the zipper to hold up better for such an expensive coat.
customer_reviews.author: ghostrider

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: So far it is good. I ordered another North Face coat prior to this one and I don't think it was a north face, so I sent it back. This one seem to be a North Face coat, it warm and no issues with it. North Face tends to run small on all their items so order in size always.
customer_reviews.author: LynnBee

customer_reviews.title: Second Coat arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The second coat I returned looked as if it had been cut with a knife on the front left panel adjacent to the zipper.There was also an orange stain on the front left side. The jacket was too large. There was not a medium available. It was a wonderful coat otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great coat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! (I was sick of getting basic black all the time). Like all North Face, it is well made and very warm. The length was a bit longer than I was expecting, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Blakeley

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD FIT
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS NOT A GOOD FIT. NO MATTER WHAT SIZE. HAD TO RETURN.
customer_reviews.author: Sinay

customer_reviews.title: Great foul weather insulator.  Rainy conditions wear under a waterproof shell
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is an A-line cut, not pinched waisted - the waist is loose fitting. Love the hood and two-way zipper. Cons: Not a waterproof item. Would like some interior pockets and sweater cuffs
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Byers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: First day Great! After that all feathers are coming out like no tomorrow which makes you sneeze!
customer_reviews.author: helene matthews

customer_reviews.title: Baggy fitting coat
customer_reviews.text: Too baggy and I’ll fitting. I think I got an outlet version. I returned because of the fit and got a Patagonia one I am totally obsessed with at a better price!!
customer_reviews.author: NatalieB_Well

customer_reviews.title: great coat
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the others that say this is very warm. I live in NH and it has been a super winter coat. Perfect length, stylish stitching, large enough hood for lots of hair!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves seem to run shorter I have the same style north face but I noticed this one is a little thinner and loses feathers my other one did not do that the zipper only zips one way my other one does both and that’s a nice feature with a long coat for sitting
customer_reviews.author: tim roeder

customer_reviews.title: RIPS EASY!!
customer_reviews.text: The material is very easy to rip. This is not worth the money that I spent on this. I purchased in October and by December, there are holes in the back and feathers are flying out like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great, Legit product!
customer_reviews.text: Legit North Face product. Does shed a little bit but I think that’s to be expected with any down coat. Has happened to all of my previous ones as well. Came with tags still attached. For size reference I’m 5’2” and 145 pounds. Fits but just a tiny bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Puffy Coat
customer_reviews.text: Great NF quality as expected. The coat is pretty long, which helps to keep me warm all the way down to my mid-calf. For reference, I'm 5'2", 130lbs, and bought the small. Very warm & fashionable, and plenty of room in the fit to slip on over top of a sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok jacket . It is losing a lot of feather though. The zipper just broke so used it only for a few Months.
customer_reviews.author: lauralaura

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful addition to my wardrobe! Perfect weight, looks great, and packs flat for travel. Couldn't wish for anything more. Delighted with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light but warm
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this coat. The color is beautiful . It can be used for casual or dress up. The hood is warm but not cumbersome. Love the longer length which keeps my legs warm. The price was great for a North Face down coat.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Really great coat except it sheds feathers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coat and has kept me warm in very cold weather. It also has great wind resistance. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it sheds feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat, it's a nice, casual & warm north face! I got a size small, 5'6 and 138 lbs. Sometimes it can feel a bit tight in the chest area, but a medium would have drowned me! I love the green too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: North Face Coat
customer_reviews.text: My north face coat was a great fit looks good on and still is roomy with sweat shirt or sweater underneath. I got medium but could have gotten small. Happy with medium so can layer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Used one
customer_reviews.text: This is a second hand one. The people who wear it before forgot something in the pocket. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chao Wang

customer_reviews.title: Try it before you buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very thin and unfortunately not what I expected since it is labeled as North Face. I plan to return this item and recover the $300.00.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Quick

customer_reviews.title: My lady loves this coat.... She ...
customer_reviews.text: My lady loves this coat....She is 5,4...so it stops way below her knees....It runs a litte big...I got her the large and had to return it for the medium...
customer_reviews.author: C.J

customer_reviews.title: Down coming out near zipper and various seams
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this coat. However, the quality is not on par with previous NorthFace products I've had in the past. I've only had the jacket a few weeks and a lot of down is coming out at the bottom near the zipper and around various seams. I am disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tarun Bhatnagar

customer_reviews.title: I would like some resolution on this as it was an expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: to whom it may concern. I bought my wife this North face jacket first parka feather were failing out so I returned to you. I reordered the 2nd coat and the same thing the feathers are coming out I am very unhappy with this product as I feel you sent back the same parka. I would like some resolution on this as it was an expensive item and both times the parka was defective.
customer_reviews.author: phil marrone

customer_reviews.title: nice style but upon wear
customer_reviews.text: nice style but upon wear, feathers started popping out of the seams. bought as a gift for my mother. Not impressed with the quality of stitching. Would return it, but am outside the return policy :(
customer_reviews.author: Nora A.

customer_reviews.title: Best coat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coat. I went up a size so it could be a big bigger and not so snug for when I wear thick sweaters under it. It’s comfortable and very warm. Very happy with it. I love theibg length that it covers my legs clear to my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Jeppson

customer_reviews.title: A great long women’s parka
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and flattering - the length is great for really cold northern winter days and I love the fact that you can also unzip from bottom when walking or just want more leg room from bottom. The hood stays up well when worn . I am 5’5 @ 130 lbs and ordered the small and it fit great
customer_reviews.author: Amy Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great coat but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat, but have to really watch my winter layers when wearing it. It runs small, so if I am wearing anything too bulky it is tight to get zipped up. I wish I would have gone up a size when ordering, so it could accommodate bulk with sweaters and scarves better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Owens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful winter coat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and fit! Super happy with purchase. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Stashia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Super Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality in construction and design! It’s perfect! So thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: M. Beth Van Ven

customer_reviews.title: Great coat.
customer_reviews.text: This coat fits perfectly and is adorable. I love the longer length for windy days. I am 5'4 and weigh 134 # and the medium gives enough room for a comfortable fit with a sweater. It arrived on time and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: heather wlson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable warm and true to color
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very warm and comfortable. It is true to its color displayed on Amazon purchase. I have had one for years and my daughter wanted one for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. Great for very cold temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Love the coat
customer_reviews.text: I bought another coat last year trying to avoid the higher cost of North Face (which was too long even though it is warm and nicely made) but now that I have it I wish I’d purchased it the first time. This is a great coat with perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the coat, wish it had come in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lauthern

customer_reviews.title: I love the coat
customer_reviews.text: I love the coat! I bought one size larger since it has a fitted waist. I also like the contrasting grey lining.
customer_reviews.author: young america

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD FIT
customer_reviews.text: THIS COAT DID NOT FIT WELL AT ALL. BOUGHT IT IN 2 DIFFERENT SIZES NEITHER ONE FIT WELL. HAD TO RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Sinay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great & looks great. Nice and long to keep me warm but isn’t too heavy. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stashia

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time. Color is as advertised. Can’t keep my kids from stealing It!
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: SUPER WARM!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! Nice fit not too bulky but still very warm! Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Great quality. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! So lightweight yet WARM. Best of all, it has a cinch feature for the hood.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: I really like both of my coats and my jacket! Living in Northern Minnesota, especially when the temp is 30 below zero with a wind chill, these coats kept me warm. Love the colors also and the style.
customer_reviews.author: Kim l

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love my North Face Metropolis Coat. Not too puffy but very warm. 👍
